titleStmt.title: Paroimiographia Proverbs, or, Old sayed savves & adages in English (or the Saxon toung), Italian, French, and Spanish, whereunto the British for their great antiquity and weight are added ... / collected by J.H., Esqr.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

notesStmt.note: Collected by James Howell. Cf. Wing.
Included on reels 636 and 1594 as part of Howell's Lexicon tetraglotton : an English-French-Italian-Spanish dictionary.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Harvard University Library.
